results.title: Lentiform fork sign in a uremic patient after inadvertent exposure to metformin.
results.text_hl: Lentiform fork sign in a @<m>DISEASE_Hemolytic_Uremic_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006463 @@@uremic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ after inadvertent exposure to @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

results.title: Concerted outcome of metformin and low dose of radiation in modulation of cisplatin induced uremic encephalopathy via renal and neural preservation.
results.text_hl: Concerted outcome of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and low dose of radiation in modulation of @CHEMICAL_Cisplatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002945 @@@cisplatin@@@ induced @<m>DISEASE_Hemolytic_Uremic_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006463 @@@uremic encephalopathy@@@ via renal and neural preservation.

results.title: The Effect of Uremic Solutes on the Organic Cation Transporter 2.
results.text_hl: We first screened 72 @<m>DISEASE_Hemolytic_Uremic_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006463 @@@uremic solutes@@@ as inhibitors of [14C]-labeled @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ uptake by @GENE_SLC22A2 @GENE_6582 @@@OCT2@@@.
